name: Not Frogger (Nore5515)
description:
UPDATE

Added global stats, fixed chest spawning in front of door bug.

You can now use E to open your inventory.

A game idea I had, and one that I wanted to work on for at least a week before uploading! It was nice to try and focus on the same project for a week, I usually do short, 1-48 hour game jams. The screen resolution was a challenge I gave myself, to try and make something that would fit a phone screen. Fullscreen recommended!!! 

All sprites are 16x16 and made either by myself (not much of an artist) or Qwakk (much more of an artist). Go check him out!

I feel like I could have done a lot more (i.e. more items, more enemies, more tiles, SOUNDS), and still may add more to this game in the future!

But I wouldn't count on it.

Credits to Qwakk for helping out with some art assets!
